description: NYC Space/Time Directory Object, with identifier, name, date, geometry and data fields

id.description: Identifier of Object, must be unique in this dataset

type.description: Object type, must be one of the types in the enum

validSince.description: Date or year from when Object exists or is valid

validUntil.description: Date or year until when Object exists or is valid

geometry.description: GeoJSON geometry, either a Point, LineString or Polygon (or their Multi variants), or a GeometryCollection

data.description: JSON data object, dataset descriptor of dataset to which Object belongs has a `fields` property containing the JSON Schema to which the contents of this property must conform
